text: Idet pryamym putem lish' tot, Kogo Allakh (Svoim vseveden'yem) napravit. Kogo zh bluzhdat' (v grekhakh) ostavit On, Tomu zashchitnika ty ne naydesh', krome Nego. V Den' Voskreseniya (na Sud) My soberem ikh vsekh: Slepykh, nemykh, glukhikh - Nichkom (unizhenno) lezhashchikh, - Pristanishche im - ogn' Ada, I vsyakiy raz, kogda ogon' slabeyet, Yego usilivayem My
